short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CaptainA is an Amazon seller tool that helps sellers to request reviews automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CaptainA tracks all of Amazon products total Amazon FBA fees, monthly revenue and monthly sales units and shows them when you are navigating on Amazon itself. Therefore, you can decide next product idea easily with CaptainA


CaptainA helps sellers to request reviews automatically and makes sellers track request status directly at Amazon Seller Central.

Reviews are very important in Amazon. Customers decide to buy a product by looking at product reviews. With CaptainA Extension, sellers can request reviews automatically and track the request status easily. CaptainA extension shows review request status as 'Sent', 'Scheduled' or 'Cancelled' with alert boxes on Manage Order page at Amazon Seller Central depending of the order's request status.


CaptainA also tracks and shows all of your productsâ€™ reviews. You can find who gives a specific review by CaptainA Find Order feature.
